TurnAnnouncer.TurnCardHint: Override turn card text. Use {name} for combatant's name.
TurnAnnouncer.RoundCardHint: Override round card text. Use {round} for round number.
TurnAnnouncer.MissedTurnHint: Displays small message for GM about potential missed turns.
TurnAnnouncer.RoundCyclingHint: Post a message when round cycles.
TurnAnnouncer.ObfuscateNPCsHint: Obfuscate names of certain combatants for players. GM will see names as normal with slightly altered turn announcer card.

ObfuscateNPCsVisibility.Visible: Token is visible to a player
ObfuscateNPCsVisibility.Any: Player owned or token name visible

TurnAnnouncer.HidePortraitHint: Do not include portrait in new chat messages.
TurnAnnouncer.CompactHint: Removes speaker and timestamp from turn announcement messages.
